column5: Started the Season off Saturday fishing for Lmbass caught 7 between 1.5 & 2 lbs then had a wedding to go to, took the brothers Z& father out on Sunday for 9 hrs & the 2nd cast with a Bass Magnet Tube, what a great way to start the season, Jun 27/10 20" Smallie      Jun 28th off to another lake from 3 til about 8 & did we get wet for about 1/2 hr, we caught about 15 or 20 but nothing big on jerk baits & tubes again, off to BPS CBAF meeting on Jun 29 & tackle shopping with my Grand Daughter on Jun 30th  Jul 1st off to Silver Lake & got skunked, Jul 2nd went fishing tagged a few bass & pike & saw Splashhopper & Dutchy  Jul 3rd helped run a kids derby at Fisherman's Cove with 123 kids, here are a couple pictures lots of fish were caught, prizes for 1st & 2nd place & a certifacate & grab bag for all the kids every body    Jul 4th canoeing the Maitland & tagging Smallies with my 4 yr old Granddaughter  She actually climbed over the seat & the cooler & around her other grandfather when I caught a 15" smallie Bob thought we were going to tip for sure haha  Here's big ugly my 1st Bowfin caught on a flip'n jig Jul 6th  My cousin Pete enjoying Bass & Pike fishing he usually fishes for Walleye Trout & Salmon, but really enjoyed himself says he wants to do that again & sooner than later  Flip'n Jig comes threw again  Pete was using Tubes  18.5" Lmbass Bass Magnets Flip'n Jig  Pre fishing with Al for the CBAF Tourney at Dog/Whitefish/Cranberry Lakes what a great day  Tournament day with my partner Chuck & 3 of our 5 fish limit we caught, we ended up 15th with 14.99lbs, I caught our 1st 2 fish the 1 I'm holding & another smaller one in the 1st 1/2 hr, a great start to a perfect day frogg'n & flipp'n Thanx for the day Chuck  Fished 12 of the days & went to a BPS CBAF Club Meeting life doesn't get much better, Til next time have a good one SORRY for the Length Richard
Nice job Richard. Was up at the same spot we met you on saturday and got a 3lb Smallie (18 inches). Pity you weren't there to tag it. Next time maybe.....
Great report. Good to see you hit multiple bodies of water during your vacation.
Great Report & Great Times . . . Thanks for Sharing.  Tell that one fella that he needs to find a fire to throw that Bosh jersey in!
Sounds like you had a great time spinnerbaitking Great report and pics!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Looks like you have been keeping busy and the fish have been biting good. Thanks for sharing!
thanks for taking the time to share and post!  Looks like a great way to spend some time away from the normal grind!!  Cheers!
